title: Greek pumpkin and raisin puff pastry pie
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins pumpkin puree', '150g caster sugar', '145g raisins', '165g fine semolina', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 (320g boxes) frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 egg, slightly beaten']
